Siddhi Potdar

University of Texas at Dallas · (000) 000-0000 · siddhi.potdar2013.com

I am Siddhi Potdar, a 23 year old masters student at university of texas at dallas, TX. I have completed my undergraduate degree from Savitribai Phule Pune University (formerly known as University of Pune) and have about 1 year of work experience with a programmatic advertising company, PubMatic. I worked there as a Machine Learning QA Automation Engineer, where I build independent robust test suites to test various Machine Learning jobs that helped in ad-space bidding. I love to explore and learn various technologies and frameworks, but my main interest lies in understanding the working of different Machine Learning models and using them to solve different problem statements.

Experience

Software QA Automation Engineer

PubMatic, Inc.

Worked at the programmatic advertising company that uses Machine Learning techniques to automate inventory sales. Developed and maintain automation test suites for multiple ML projects, and also performed QA verifications for incremental changes using py-test, PySpark and distributed systems. Joined part-time in April 2021 with undergraduate studies and started working full time from August 2021, till July 2022.

April 2021 - July 2022

Academic Intern

Persistent Systems Pvt. Ltd.

Joined a multi-national software product company in the senior year and underwent training in Java, SQL, Maven, and GIT.

January 2021 - March 2021

Technical Trainee (Python Developer)

myMO IT Solutions

Worked remotely at the software company for 3 months and learned Scrapy and GIT, and also developed a web-app to extract the table of contents with proper links for a given documentation website.

Janurary 2020 - March 2020

Projects

Forecasting PubMatic Revenue

Tech: Python, FBProphet
Used FBProphet model to help forecast daily and quarterly revenue generated by PubMatic, as a part of a 6 month long competition, from January 2022 to July 2022.
July 2022

Extraction of Metadata for Video Ads

Tech: Python, TensorFlow, Keras, Hadoop & OpenCV
Used EfficientNet model to extract metadata from video ads to help their categorization.
December 2021

Artificial Vision for Visually Impaired

Tech: Python, Flask, Anvil, Ionic, JUnit, PyTorch
Developed an end-to-end voice-controlled mobile application that assists the visually impaired by answering questions about their surroundings using Visual Question Answering and Optical Character Recognition techniques.
May 2021

Detection of Liver Diseases

Tech: Python, Scikit-learn
Implemented a tree-based model that can predict the presence of liver disease, trained using a benchmark dataset.
March 2021

RFID-based Smart Trolley

Tech: Raspberry Pi, RFID & Python
Built a shopping cart that uses RFID technology to mark the price of added items and generate the final receipt.
December 2021

Facial Recognition Based Attendance Marking and Analysis System

Tech: Python, TensorFlow, PyQT5, MongoDB
Implemented an efficient attendance marking system and data analysis tool using Python. Front-end coded using PyQt5. Database management implemented using MongoDB.
December 2021

Image Captioning Model

Tech: Python, TensorFlow, Flask, HTML & CSS
Implemented a web service app using Flask & HTML to generate titles for images using deep learning.
December 2021

Awards & Publications

  • Paper: Artificial Vision for Visually Impaired, Siddhi Potdar, Aditya Kawale, Sakshi Gupta, Siddharth Kulkarni, published in Journal of Critical Reviews, 2020
